query:
{
      orderHistoryV2(
        soldTo:"0000002610",

        fromDate:"20220916",

        orderBy:"orderDate",
        sort: "desc",    
        companyName: "ZPPL-Changi   "){
          OrderHistory{
            OrderBasicInformation{ SoldTo ShipTo CompanyName }
            OrderItems {
              MaterialCode
              MaterialDescription
              Qty
              UnitPrice
              TotalPrice
              Status
              DeliveryDate
              DeliveryTime
              LineNumber
              Tax
              OrderType
              OrderNumber
              EZRXNumber

              CreatedTime

              PurchaseOrderType  
            }
          }
        }
      }
